DE_Adv_Winter1: Advent Day 1^It is the start of winter, and that means the start of your advent calendar. Let's get your holiday cheer started, claim your first gift!
DE_Adv_Winter24: Advent Day 24!^Tonight is the night! But are you prepared? Surely you haven't forgotten you'll get a special visitor tonight? Make sure to leave the milk and cookies out on the table overnight!
